content: भौम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (मी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [भूमेरपत्यं तस्या इदं वा अण्] {@--1@} Belonging to the earth. {@--2@} Being on the earth, earthly, terrestrial; भौमो मुनेः स्थानपरिग्रहोयं <ls>R. 13. 36</ls>; <ls n="R.">15. 59.</ls> {@--3@} Earthy, made of earth. {@--4@} Relating to Mars. --मः {@--1@} The planet Mars. {@--2@} An epithet of the demon Naraka. {@--3@} Water. {@--4@} Light. {@--5@} Sky, atmosphere. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of Atri.
